title: Executive Order 6512-Amendment of Executive Order No. 6433-A, of November 17, 1933
content: Whereas the last paragraph of Executive Order No. 6433-A, dated November 17, 1933, creating the National Emergency Council, abolishes, effective 30 days from the date of said order, the volunteer field agencies established under and for the purpose of effectuating the legislation under the authority of which said order was issued; and
Whereas it is desirable and necessary to defer to a later date the abolition of such volunteer field agencies;
Now, Therefore, it is hereby ordered that the effective date for the abolition of the aforesaid volunteer field agencies be, and hereby is, deferred to January 16, 1934.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6512-Amendment of Executive Order No. 6433-A, of November 17, 1933 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/373308
